markdown.headingText: 1. [Genetics of age at onset in major depression](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41398-022-01888-z)
markdown.markdown:
I believe the first/last author system has it's particular weaknesses, among them a difficult in clearly defining what each author has contributed. Here i list all academic papers for which i am a co-author, and describe my contribution.


This was my first project as a RA, a project that grew out from my bachelor thesis. I wrote all research code, wrote the paper (with input from my supervisor). Code is available [here](https://github.com/Ararder/Genetics-of-age-at-onset-in-MD).

## 2. [Genetic heterogeneity and subtypes of major depression](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41380-021-01413-6)

For this paper i gave technical support. I got the fastGWA software setup, generated the genetic relatedness matrix for UKB (N=457k) for our local compute cluster. I also assisted with setting up [HDL](https://github.com/zhenin/HDL#:~:text=be%20found%20here.-,What%20is%20HDL%3F,correlation%20estimate%20by%20about%2060%25.) on the compute cluster, and provided sample scripts for running HDL over several phenotypes. Lastly, i reviewed the majority of the [research code](https://github.com/Thuy-Dung-Nguyen/MD-subtypes), refactoring some of the verbose part and catching a few minor errors.

#
